name: Nyheim
description: Nyheim is a single-player digital boardgame about rebuilding the titular city of Nyheim after a lethal pandemic. As survivors of the disease, your party must explore the districts of Nyheim, face mutated rats, gather supplies and lead the efforts towards a new society!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
